name: Crochet Cowboy Outfit - Cowboy Hat, Diaper Corver, Suspenders, Chaps - Photo Prop
description:
This listing is for an adorable Crochet Cowboy Chaps with a Diaper Cover and a Matching Cowboy Hat. This Cowboy Set is well known for it's grand entrance to birthday parties! So gear up your cowboy with this set for a grand entrance for any occasion all year around!

The chaps are attached to the diaper cover with a added tie on in the front for easy adjustment. The diaper cover is adjustable to be able to make it tighter or looser. The cowboy hat goes with the set with a sheriff star attached to it.

This set is for the 0-3 MONTHS, 3-6 MONTHS, AND 6-9 MONTHS!! If you would like a larger size, please contact me prior to purchase

Sizes available for *this set*:
Cowboy Chaps, Diaper Cover & Cowboy Hat:
0-3 months
3-6 months
6-9 months

Thanks for stopping by my shop!

www.etsy.com/shop/yumyumbaby
www.facebook.com/wendyheckermandesigns

Cowboy Chaps pattern by Carolyn VanOstran
Cowboy Hat pattern by The Lovely Crow

name: Crochet Firefighter Inspired Outfit - Baby Boy, Baby Girl - Hat, Diaper Cover - Photo Prop
description:
This listing is for an adorable Crochet Firefighter Baby/Toddler Outfit. Set includes the crochet firefighter hat, diaper cover, and suspenders. This is perfect all year long and for any occasion. Great for that special baby in your life, to give as a gift, or to even use as a photography prop! Made from soft yarn for even the most delicate skin! 

You have the option of having the "FD" letters on the hat to be crochet or felt.

Sizes available:
0-3 months
3-6 months
6-9 months
9-12 months
18 months
24 months

Care Instructions: Hand wash in cool water with mild soap. Lay flat to dry.

Thank you for stopping by my shop! Please ask me any questions you may have!

www.facebook.com/wendyheckermandesigns

name: Crochet Baby Girl Sandals - Summer - Photography Prop
description:
This listing is for a pair of these adorable Baby Girls Sandals. It's perfect for anytime of the year, especially spring and summer. This would be a great gift for your little baby girl!

Size include:
0-6 months - measures up to 3.75 inches (has 2 circles on strap)
6-12 months - measures up to 4.5 inches (has 3 circles on strap-as pictured) 

Thanks for stopping by my shop! Let me know if you have any questions!

Intended to be worn, not played with. Contains small pieces (buttons/jewels), keep close eye on children.

Check me out on facebook! www.facebook.com/wendyheckermandesigns
______________________________________________
Pattern provided by twogirlspatterns

name: Crochet BatGirl Cape with Mask - Batman - Super Hero Costume - Photography Prop
description:
This listing is for an adorable Crochet Batman (Bat Girl) cape with mask! Handmade to the very last detail, this cute set comes with a cape and a mask. The cape is made from soft pink, gray, and yellow acrylic yarn. The famous bat symbol is cut from top quality fabric (or felt) and placed securely on beautiful yellow fabric (or felt), making this set one of a kind! The soft mask completes this set, making this perfect for any occasion, including Halloween, Baby Shower or Birthday gifts, or to use as a photography prop. Whatever the occasion, your baby girl or baby boy will be sure to make a grand entrance!

This can be customized in different colors to be set for a baby girl or baby boy:

Colors:
Baby Girl: Pink, Gray, Yellow, with Black Bat Logo (as pictured)
Baby Boy: Black, Gray, Yellow, with Black Bat Logo

This set is available in sizes:
0-3 months
3-6 months
6-12 months

Care Instructions: Hand wash cape and mask with cool water, being careful around the fabric/felt. Only spot wash the fabric/felt when necessary. Reshape and lay flat to dry.

Thanks for stopping by my shop! Please let me know if you have any questions!

Check me out on Facebook: www.facebook.com/wendyheckermandesigns

Photo provided by Fayelin Olivia Zebley Photography

name: Crochet Mermaid Outfit - Tail, Bikini Top, Headband
description:
This listing is for an adorable crochet mermaid outfit that is made to order. This mermaid outfit includes the entire set, which is the mermaid tail, starfish bikini top, and a starfish headband. This can be customized to any color you may like. The bikini top can be made with the traditional triangle shapes, or the seashell shape as pictured. This set is made from soft yarn for even the most delicate skin.

Perfect for that special baby in your life! Great to give as a gift, use for a Halloween costume, or to even use as a photograph prop!

Sizes available:
Newborn
0-3 months
3-6 months

I recommend that sit set be made for babies that are not walking around yet. If you do wish to have this outfit made for an older baby, please message me prior to purchase and I will be more than happy to customize this listing and price for you.

Care Instructions: Gently hand wash each individual item in cool water with mild soap. Reshape and lay flat to dry.

**Please allow 1-2 weeks for me to make this item, as each item of mine is handmade with care and love.**

Thanks for stopping by my shop! Please let me know if you have any questions!
